span.span: Provides user interface (UI) elements that enable a user to recover or reset a lost password and receive it in email.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 本主題內容：In this topic: - [簡介Introduction](#introduction) - [檢視Views](#views) - [樣式和範本Styles and Templates](#styles_and_templates) - [驗證群組Validation Groupings](#validation_groupings) - [套用 CSS 樣式Applying CSS Styles](#applying_styles) - [協助工具選項Accessibility](#accessibility) - [宣告式語法Declarative Syntax](#declarative_syntax) ## 簡介Introduction 控制可協助使用者忘記其密碼。The control assists users who have forgotten their passwords. 它可讓使用者要求包含新的密碼或密碼已與使用者名稱相關聯的電子郵件訊息。It enables a user to request an email message containing either a new password or the password already associated with his or her user name. > [!NOTE] > Web 控制項傳送給使用者的復原或新的密碼使用網際網路電子郵件服務。The Web control uses Internet email services to send recovered or new passwords to users. 沒有固有的安全性風險，傳送電子郵件中的密碼。There are inherent security risks with sending passwords in email. 您應該判斷是否可以接受您的網站將這些安全性風險。You should determine whether these security risks are acceptable to your site. > [!NOTE] > 如果您不熟悉 ASP.NET 中可用的登入控制項組，請參閱[ASP.NET 登入控制項概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d)才能繼續。If you are not familiar with the set of login controls available in ASP.NET, see [ASP.NET Login Controls Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ac032230-6469-4b03-b68d-03ef2643a24d) before continuing. 如需登入控制項及成員資格相關的其他主題的清單，請參閱[使用成員資格管理使用者](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd)。For a list of other topics related to login controls and membership, see [Managing Users by Using Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/824c3a24-f0af-427c-a652-0d2d1e9397cd). 使用者可以復原密碼，在定義成員資格提供者時，才屬性支援純文字或加密的密碼。Users can recover passwords only when the membership provider defined in the property supports clear text or encrypted passwords. 雜湊的密碼無法復原，因為使用者站台上使用雜湊的密碼只能重設其密碼。Because hashed passwords cannot be recovered, users at sites that use hashed passwords can only reset their passwords. > [!IMPORTANT] > 接受使用者輸入可能會造成安全性威脅。Accepting user input is a potential security threat. 惡意使用者可以傳送資料，目的是要公開的弱點可能會或執行程式，嘗試產生的密碼。Malicious users can send data that is intended to expose vulnerabilities or run programs that try generated passwords. 為了提高安全性，處理使用者輸入時，您應該使用您的控制項的驗證功能，並保護您的控制項設定的任何資料提供者。To improve security when working with user input, you should use the validation features of your control and secure any data providers that are configured for your control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[保護登入控制項](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c)，[的 Web 應用程式的基本安全性作法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad)，和[保護的成員資格](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7)。For more information, see [Securing Login Controls](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d85075bc-9c1a-4453-8a0c-539b10853c9c), [Basic Security Practices for Web Applications](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/3eeeee9e-b09f-4c7f-8ce5-d9ca1f9322ad), and [Securing Membership](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/2dab2012-c278-426a-bb0d-93b260c428a7). > [!NOTE] > 尚未核准的成員資格使用者時，就可以使用控制項 (設`false`)，但不在成員資格使用者鎖定時使用 (設`true`)。The control can be used when a membership user has not been approved ( is set to `false`), but it cannot be used when a membership user has been locked out ( is set to `true`). 使用來傳送電子郵件訊息類別。The email message is sent using the class. 若要能夠傳送電子郵件給使用者，您必須設定郵件伺服器應用程式的 Web.config 檔案中。To be able to send email to users, you must configure a mail server in your application's Web.config file. 您可以變更的內容中設定自訂的訊息傳送給使用者的電子郵件屬性。You can change the content of the email sent to users by setting a custom message in the property. > [!NOTE] > 不保證會接收使用者，或檢視電子郵件訊息。It is not possible to guarantee that a user will receive or view an email message. 若要確認使用者已收到通知，透過電子郵件，請考慮提供確認在訊息中，可讓使用者確認收到通知的連結。To verify that a user has received a notification by email, consider providing a confirmation link in the message, allowing the user to confirm that the notification was received. ## 檢視Views 控制項有三個狀態或檢視表：The control has three states, or views: - to reset the password. - 順利完成檢視表-會告知使用者密碼復原或重設成功與否。Success view -- Tells the user whether the password recovery or reset was successful. 控制項只會顯示 [問題] 檢視中定義的成員資格提供者屬性支援密碼問題和解答。The control displays the remarks.format: ## Remarks 引發伺服器上的使用者名稱提交給成員資格提供者，以判斷是否為有效的使用者名稱之前。The event is raised on the server before the user name is submitted to the membership provider to determine whether the user name is valid. 使用此事件執行任何所需的使用者名稱，例如將其轉換成全為大寫或小寫字母，或正在驗證的使用者名稱為特定的格式，例如電子郵件地址的前置處理。Use this event to perform any preprocessing needed on the user name, such as converting it to all uppercase or lowercase letters, or verifying that the user name is in a particular format, such as an email address. 控制第一個引發事件，然後使用成員資格提供者中指定與屬性，以判斷輸入的使用者名稱是否為有效的使用者名稱的網站。The control first raises the event, and then uses the membership provider specified in the property to determine whether the user name entered is a valid user name for the Web site. 如果它是有效的而且成員資格提供者支援密碼問題和解答，密碼驗證問題會傳回從網站和控制項會顯示 [問題] 檢視。If it is valid, and the membership provider supports password question and answer, the password verification question is returned from the Web site and the control displays the Question view. 如果使用者名稱不是有效的在文字屬性會顯示在使用者檢視表中，以便使用者可以輸入不同的使用者名稱。If the user name is not valid, the text in the property is displayed in the UserName view so that the user can enter a different user name. 如果成員資格提供者不支援密碼問題和解答，就會引發事件及傳送電子郵件給使用者以新的或已復原的密碼。If the membership provider does not support password question and answer, the event is raised and email is sent to the user with the new or recovered password. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用事件，以檢查是否為有效的電子郵件地址格式化送出的使用者名稱。The following code example uses the event to check whether the submitted user name is formatted as a valid email address. 如果使用者名稱的格式不正確，屬性會變更為顯示錯誤。If the user name is not formatted properly, the property is changed to show the error.
